Flow.description: - Removed check for ROE Territory in favor of comparing the users assigned region to the account's shipping region
Flow.label: Account - Claim Button

recordLookups.name: Get_committed_customers_in_user_s_name
recordLookups.label: Get committed customers in user's name

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because you already own {!customer_account_count} accounts and you may only own a total of {!$User.Account_Max_Owned_Total_Num__c} prospect accounts at one time.


Please transfer some of your accounts into the account pool before claiming this account.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because this account is an active Committed customer.


Please work with your manager if you would like to be assigned to this account.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because this account is in the {!recordId.Segment__c} segment.


You may only claim accounts in the {!$User.Opportunity_Segment__c} segment.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because it is located in: {!recordId.ShippingCountry}


You may claim accounts located in the following countries: {!Check_allowed_countries.selectedValuesSemicolonString}


Please select a different account with a shipping country that is one of the above countries. If you believe this account's location is incorrect, please contact Sales Operations.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because it is located in: {!recordId.ShippingCountry}


You may not claim accounts located in the following countries: {!Check_disallowed_countries_0.selectedValuesSemicolonString}


Please select a different account with a shipping country that is not in one of the above countries. If you believe the location of this account is incorrect, please contact Sales Operations.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account you were the owner {!days_since_prior_owner} days ago.


You may only claim an account if you were not the owner in the last {!Get_running_user.Account_Min_Time_Before_Reclaim_Days__c} days.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account right now. {!Get_global_permissions.Reason__c}

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account right now because account claiming is not enabled for your role.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: You have already submitted a claim request or this account.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account because it is not in the Account Pool.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account because account claiming is disabled for your role.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account {!recordId.Professional_Services__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Professional_Services__r.LastName} is already listed as the Professional Services team member.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account {!recordId.Partner_Sales__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Partner_Sales__r.LastName} is already listed as the Partner Sales team member.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account because account claiming is not configured for your role. Please contact Revenue Operations.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account {!recordId.Renewal_Manager__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Renewal_Manager__r.LastName} is already listed as the Renewal Manager.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: You cannot claim this account {!recordId.Executive_Sponsor__r.FirstName} {!recordId.Executive_Sponsor__r.LastName} is already listed as the Executive Sponsor.

fields.name: Error_not_in_pool_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You cannot claim this account because this account is in the {!recordId.Shipping_Region__c} region.


You may only claim accounts in the region you are assigned ({!$User.Region__c}).

fields.name: Submit_request
fields.fieldText: You are submitting a request to claim this account. You may (optionally) provide any context behind this request which might be helpful to Sales leadership if multiple reps want to claim this account. To submit, click Next.

fields.name: Claim_Request_Context
fields.fieldText: [Optional] Claim Request Context:

fields.name: Error_db_busy
fields.fieldText: Error: Could not claim account because the database is busy. Please wait a minute and try again.

fields.name: Success_message
fields.fieldText:
{!recordId.Name} is now in your name.


You own a total of {!New_accounts_owned} accounts.

fields.name: Success_message_0
fields.fieldText: You are now the assigned {!$User.Account_Team_Primary_Role__c} on {!recordId.Name}.

fields.name: success_header
fields.fieldText: Your request to claim {!recordId.Name} has been successfully submitted. Revenue Operations will review all requests and follow up with you.

textTemplates.name: chatter_post
